bug.summary: Bug with 1 shared layer and 2 independent layers
bug.description: Describe the bug There is a problem with the way we deal with layers indexing that deals to a bug. What is the current behavior? You'll get an error if trying to set n_shared to 1 and n_independent to 2 for example. Expected behavior We should be able to put any value without error. A fairly simple fix should be done
